remarks: The predicate " ` F ` is a measurable function from the measurable space ` S ` to the measurable space ` T ` ".  Cf. ~ ismbf (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 23-Jan-2017.)
statement:
ismbfm.1 $e |- ( ph -> S e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) $.
ismbfm.2 $e |- ( ph -> T e. U. ran sigAlgebra ) $.
ismbfm $p |- ( ph -> ( F e. ( S MblFnM T ) <-> ( F e. ( U. T ^m U. S ) /\ A. x e. T ( `' F " x ) e. S ) ) ) $.
$d F x $.
$d S x $.
$d T x $.
